website_summaries.verdict: The Audeze iSine20 earphones deliver a balanced, truly impressive audio experience, but their look and price might scare off some potential listeners.
pros: Excellent audio performance with robust lows, clear highs, and wonderful dynamics
Includes two detachable cables, one with inline remote control
Utilizes Lightning port on iOS devices

customer_reviews.title: When you expect the best, but get better instead.
customer_reviews.text: They know what they do. They have this kind of arrogance to them. You play a song, you trust that nothing will be out of place. It's all there, it's all represented. Whenever I find a new multi layered track, it gets put to these. These are the ringer, I test every song and every new headphone against these and while some may sound more dynamic or exciting they just don't ever BEAT these. My only reason for a four star review is comfort wise I found the ear clips can pinch slightly after extensive use. I start off not even aware I have them in, but eventually it can get distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Cipher cable stopped working after 5 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good when connected to an Astell&Kern AK300, although I'm still playing with equalizer settings to optimize the sound with the standard audio cable. I was very much looking forward to trying these earphones with my iPod touch. In fact, the sound seemed quite good when I connected them via the included Cipher cable, but only for a few seconds; the earphones stopped working and I thought I had pressed the wrong button. But in fact the Audeze apps tells me that "No cable" is connected. So it looks like the Cipher cable only lasted about 5 seconds. Much has been written about the comfort of these earphones (or lack thereof); I actually find them quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Waeber

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Tested these v my Shure 425's and there is no comparison. The Audeze have a depth and soundscape that really engages from Pop to Jazz to Metal and Opera. Through my Chord Mojo they sound even better. Note the cipher lead is not included in this particular package and will buy when available in the UK or direct from the US to try their DAC via mobile and Hi Res performance. Overall comfort is not 100% for listening for long periods, but happy to sacrifice that for the gorgeous hi end sound.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re wondering if they’re better than the 10s, they are. Better sound stage and separation, better sparkle up high and better extending and controlled bass. All the good written about the isines is true for me. Sound will vary largely when using analog cables vs the lightning. I can only comment on them via lightning of apple products and my comment is they’re phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Good if you’re Shrek
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish. The stem of the headphone that fits into your ear canal is so long.. stupidly long. I think it would fit a donkey, not a human. Sent back for refund
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a week ago and could not wait to try them. Unfortunately the left hand earphone did not work. There was A hand signed certificate in the box saying these had been fully tested before despatch.Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Crap accessories, sounds sharp
customer_reviews.text: They sound wide with a full sound stage. Imo they're slightly harsh on the high end. I bought these to replace my Shure SE215 and yet after the ear hooks and cable broke soon after purchase along with the fatiguing trebble, I have gone back to the SE215s.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Just Superb.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent sound quality. You don’t quite believe you are wearing earphones rather than headphones due to such a wide soundstage. Works best on iPhone in my opinion, even with my Schiit bifrost dac and beyerdynamic a20 it doesn’t sound quite as refined as the in built dac. You may want to adjust the eq settings a bit for a higher low mid and bass and also some more treble to really improve it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Although initially fiddly to put on, one is rewarded with fantastic sound quality from such a small form factor using the supplied lightning cable. Pair it with the recently released Bluetooth cable to make it truly versatile. Should be used at home, office or quiet walks (ie not heavy traffic or tube unless you like cranking up the volume, which its definitely capable of).
customer_reviews.author: Leegan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Too much echo
customer_reviews.text: Guys beaware there is too much echo on the mic . If you are someone who is like me who wants to use this to make calls as well . Then don’t bother wasting money. You pay hafty amount and this is what you get. Too much echo! Don’t waste money on this .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed for a expensive headphone!!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of distortion with cypher lighting cable, followed all instruction from their main site. Item is damaged!
customer_reviews.author: ZSL

customer_reviews.title: Never trust second hand enterprises!
customer_reviews.text: The item was damaged. It is a shame and so pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: These sound absolutely amazing with the right source. Yes, it’s a love it or hate it kind of design but the iSine 20s are very hard to beat by sub-£1000 IEMs. The cipher cable for iOS gave a pretty good boost to my iPhone’s sound as well. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Yanakiev

customer_reviews.title: Audeze and BioEars soft silicone Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones if they are uncomfortable use the bioears silicone plugs and form with your fingers the perfect seal. Every time you take them off or on you can reshape the silicone.
customer_reviews.author: CONSTANTIN KEFALAS

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no in-ear headphone in the world like these. I was sceptical to begin with, as they're not the cheapest headphones to buy. Having used them for a few days, I have no regrets. Great sound for a variety of genres, and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O.

customer_reviews.title: You get the same open feel that you have with all Audeze headphones and also a brilliant soundstage. Don’t be fooled by the size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones having already been a fan of the Audeze range after listening to the LCD-3’S for the last year. The first thing I can say about these headphones is that they are outstanding! I was looking for something I could listen to via my iPhone rather than a headphone amp/DAC. You get the same open feel that you have with all Audeze headphones and also a brilliant soundstage. Don’t be fooled by the size/look they feel very light once on your head and the little clips mean they are supported and feel comfortable to wear for hours.
customer_reviews.author: L.AL

product_meta.title: Audeze iSine Cipher Bluetooth Module in-ears
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Cipher Bluetooth Module

Introducing Audeze Cipher Bluetooth -the world’s best sounding in-ears just got a whole lot better thanks to Audeze’s new CIPHER Bluetooth Module. This detachable, lightweight device turns any Audeze iSINE headphone into a wireless Bluetooth headset with built-in microphone and volume controls. This compact modular add-on is designed to fit inside your existing iSINE travel case, making it a perfect companion to your iSINE headphones. Enjoy the peerless audio quality of Audeze’s award-winning in-ear headphones coupled with the utility and convenience of next generation Bluetooth technology.

Boasting a Bluetooth 5.0 compatible chipset with support for aptX and aptX HD, Audeze’s CIPHER Bluetooth Module offers 24-bit high resolution audio quality with low latency and seamless compatibility with the latest and greatest Bluetooth devices. As part of the growing family of Audeze CIPHER products, the CIPHER Bluetooth Module also features Audeze’s proprietary DSP to maximize the audio potential of your iSINEs. The built-in high performance microphone is capable of delivering crystal clear call quality and is Siri compatible. Powered by a high-capacity Lithium-ion battery, the CIPHER Bluetooth Module delivers up to 8 hours of continuous play. The iSINE series of in-ear headphones, the choice for artists and audiophiles worldwide, combines innovative technology and avant-garde design to deliver an immersive, dynamic music experience unlike any other in-ear. The addition of the CIPHER Bluetooth Module allows you to enjoy this world-class listening experience with true, untethered freedom.
feature_bullets: WIRELESS MUSIC: Upgrade the best sounding in-ears thank you to the new Cipher Bluetooth Module. Connect to your iSine 10 or 20 and enjoy best-in-class wireless music
BLUETOOTH: Boasts a Bluetooth 5.0 compatible chipset with support for aptX and aptX HD
HIGH-QUALITY AUDIO: Offers 24-bit high resolution audio quality with low latency, and features Audeze's proprietary DSP
CONTINUOUS PLAY: High-capacity lithium battery for 8-hours of continuous play

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
